mdq:check.name: Dataset Creator Identifier Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a dataset creator identifier exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import java.util.ArrayList as ArrayList import metadig.variable as mvar
# A resource author is not present if 'resourceAuthorIdentifier' not in globals() or resourceAuthorIdentifier is None: output = "A resource author identifier was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(resourceAuthorIdentifier)): output = "The resource author identifier is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource author identifier is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(resourceAuthorIdentifier, str) or isinstance(resourceAuthorIdentifier, unicode)): output = "The resource format '{}' was found".format(resourceAuthorIdentifier) elif (isinstance(resourceAuthorIdentifier, ArrayList)): output = "The resource author identifier '{}' was found (first of {} formats)".format(resourceAuthorIdentifier[0].strip(), resourceAuthorIdentifier.size()) else: output = "The resource author identifier '{}' was found)".format(resourceAuthorIdentifier) status = "SUCCESS" return True
